rm unnecessary, undue "prime-time televised" from lede—only televised by PBS, C-SPAN and cable news—not ABC ([[Less than Perfect]] rerun), CBS ([[Big Brother 5 (U.S.)]] or NBC ([[Last Comic Standing]]

tweaks to lede; remove references
Broad strokes in lead, though no reason why we can't link to the more specific term; minor smoothing of good recent addition

Added brief description of Obama's foreign policy thus far into the lead. Feel free to add on or improve.
Regardless of what the effects of the legislation will ultimately be, it is still a piece of health care reform legislation, not an effort.
making it "his" seems a little too possessive as he gave it to congress to sort out details, and because the effects won't be known for years, effort seems appropriate
that it was "comprehensive" is disputed, some referred to it as health insurance reform
